. Kyle Korver was mobbed by his wildly celebrating teammates. Boston Pops players sat dazed on the bench. A third overtime was on deck. Allen Iverson simply pumped his fist, his face expressionless as if he expected it. Kyle Korver hit that big shot and I was thinking, "If he hit that shot, we've got to win it, he said. After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overtime, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers" 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night. Dismissing rumours that Facebook is a threat to Google, he said the growth of the social network phenomenon has actually helped Google as people who used Facebook were also more frequent users of the search engine. Facebook usage is a net positive for us, he said. He denied the rumours that his retirement was because of increased competition from sites such as Facebook.
